Description.val:
The Special Projects program modified and/or replaced obsolete special mission equipment and integrates Quick Reaction Capability (QRC) on P-3 and P-8 aircraft.  Procurements vary in each fiscal year and include common Navy systems for increased capability, reduced operator workload and common logistics, procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations and other emerging requirements.  Active Primary Aircraft Authorized inventory is 0 aircraft.

The government is the Lead System Integrator for Hardware and Software upgrades on the aircraft.

Justification.val: For FY21 these modification efforts conclude as the P-3 Special Projects aircraft transition out of service.

Name.@footnote: P-3A In/Out for Total Prior Years should be blank, set to 1 as a workaround.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified]:: Installation Name: Mission Unique Equipment

The government is the Lead Systems Integrator for Hardware and Software upgrades on the aircraft.
